info.name: oriented forks on stripes
info.description:
Displace the forking nodes with mouse.
( click bottom-left to go back to demo-mode )
Space to rotate semi-forks instead of moving nodes.  A show modulation (i.e. phasor).

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define T(i)        texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(i,0), 0 )

#define CS(a)       vec2( cos(a), sin(a) )
#define expZ(z)   ( length(z) * CS(z) )
#define logZ(z)     vec2( length(z), atan((z).y,(z).x) )
#define mulZ(a,b) ( mat2(a, -(a).y,(a).x) * (b) )


#define PI          3.14159
#define TAU         (2.*PI)

#define keyToggle(a)  ( texelFetch(iChannel3,ivec2(a,2),0).x > 0.)
